item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Health Related YouTube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced video editor to create high-quality health-related videos for our YouTube channel. The ideal candidate will have a passion for health and wellness topics and a strong understanding of YouTube best practices. The main responsibilities of this role include editing raw footage, adding relevant graphics and effects, and ensuring the videos are engaging and visually appealing. This is a great opportunity to showcase your creativity and contribute to an influential YouTube channel in the health niche.

Skills required:
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong attention to detail
- Knowledge of YouTube video optimization techniques
- Creative thinking
- Ability to meet deadlines

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 21, 2024 03:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Cryptocurrency Videos - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for 5 top Editors who meet the following criteria :)

- Video Editing / After Effects / Motion Graphics
- $30 - $80 PER video (depends on quality)
- Length of video: between 8 and 12 minutes.
- 5 - 6 videos per month (or more)
- Preferable have knowledge / familiarity in the crypto space
- Proficiency in ENGLISH is a must
- Need to have subscription to Stock Footage websites for B-Rolls (like Storyblocks)

2. Example 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mx_DuM13ZVo
3. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x1neIXkqpOA

I’d like to see samples of work you've done before.

Did you add samples? (if not, don't apply)

Do you have over 90% job success? (if not, don't apply)

Have you earned more than 100$? (if not, don't apply)

item.title: Podcast Editor on Riverside.FM - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Podcast Editor with experience using Riverside.FM to join our team. As a Podcast Editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing audio recordings to create high-quality podcasts. This includes removing background noise, adjusting audio levels, adding music or sound effects, and ensuring a seamless flow of conversation. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of podcast production techniques and be proficient in using Riverside.FM software.
More:
1. The podcast involves add a hook+intro+rest of the podcast
2. Fix any spelling mistakes in subtitles
3. Add any Graphic images
4. Create chapters for youtube
5. Put together a youtube video description
6. Upload Youtube video in private mode

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 21, 2024 02:56 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Podcast, Audio Post Production, Audio Production, Sound Mixing
Skills: Audio Editing, Podcast, Audio Post Production, Audio Production, Sound Mixing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube video editing - Upwork
item.description:
Launching a YouTube channel in the lifestyle space and need a diligent video editor.

2-3 videos a week which will vary from 10-30 minutes each.

Style: Vlogging, tutorials, speaking to camera etc

Required: Efficient worker, English speaker, initiative to ensure the video is as user friendly, and polished, as possible (include words, handles, etc as required through out the video), has a professional approach to work.

Will also need to create the video thumbnails for the videos.

Looking for a long term partner.

Keen to get started ASAP.

This is the perfect opportunity for someone who really wants to experience growth and be part of something exciting.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 02:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia

item.title: Video Editor for Short Instagram and TikTok Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to help us with a 40 short videos that we will be posting on Instagram and TikTok. The videos need to be approximately 30 seconds - 1 min in length and will require editing to make them visually appealing and engaging. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing software and be familiar with the best practices for editing videos for social media platforms. Attention to detail and creativity are essential for this role.
    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro
    - Knowledge of video editing techniques and best practices for social media platforms
    - Ability to add effects, music, and captions to enhance videos
    - Understanding of Instagram and TikTok audience preferences and trends
    - Strong attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work within tight deadlines
Sample of work essential when applying

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 21, 2024 02:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: Australia
click to apply
